##_COMMENT1: Set your per-sample values: name and BAM path, and intervals file path.
##_COMMENT2: Path to ref_flat and intervals file.
##_COMMENT3: Path to a Docker image containing picard.
##_COMMENT4: For large BAMs, you might need to allocate more resources
##_COMMENT5: Would be unusual to take more than 24 hours, so use preemptible
